repos.dafrankort.github.io.json: This portfolio website highlights various projects. It features a tool that integrates with GitHub and an AI platform to seamlessly create project pages.

repos.discord-movienight.json: A Java Discord bot named Adam Sandler uses Javacord and Maven to organize movie nights on a server. It fetches movie data from the OMDB API, stores it in .json files, and incorporates ChatGPT using sashirestela's simple-openai library to generate personalized comments on planned movies.
